channel.title: Java Text Based Game?
channel.description:
:NOTE: I dont know if this is the right section would it go under "general questions" or "general programming"?
Anyways so about 2am this morning i decided that i wanted to create a text based game in java, nothing fancy. Just a few simple things like fishing, then you sell the fish to the shop.. I just dont know how to start.. If you guys could link me to a tutorial or something that would be great. Thanks alot.

@T41 wrote:

Enumerations and switches could also interest you – basically learn Java.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Text Based Game?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Just write it from scratch. It’s not hard.

Learn the basics. Conditional statements. Variables. Some standard method calls eg; System.out.print().

Also you might want to learn to use the Scanner class. You’ll probably use this to handle input.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Text Based Game?
item.dc:creator: @ddosd ddosd
item.description:
@ddosd wrote:

take a look at my project here. I stop developing it, but you can use it as a base.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Text Based Game?
item.dc:creator: @Mumups1 Mumups_
item.description:
@Mumups1 wrote:

java.com LOL

Well you’d want to make some variables for the amount of fish you’ve collected and cash.
Since it’s text based you’d want to use “System.out.println” to print out text to the prompt.

But yeah figure out what you want to do and go read some java docs, then put what you’ve learnt from them together and something like a text based game will be as easy as hell for ya

Read full topic
